mapper.select: SELECT d.id, f.save_file_name AS product_image, p.description AS product_description FROM product_image AS pi INNER JOIN file_info AS f ON f.id = pi.file_id INNER JOIN display_info AS d ON pi.product_id = d.product_id INNER JOIN product AS p ON d.product_id = p.id WHERE type = 'et' AND d.id = #{displayInfoId} GROUP BY d.id;
